resources.string: No valid moves! Undo one or more moves to continue.
Congratulations! You solved the puzzle by putting the frogs and toads on the opposite side.
Invalid space. Try tapping a different space.

Tap on either a frog (F) or a toad (T) to move it into an empty space. Toads can move right or up into the empty space. Frogs can move left or down into the empty space. Frogs can hop over toads into the empty space. Toads can hop over frogs into the empty space. If the toads and frogs are in the opposite position, then the game is won. If there are no legal moves, then the game will display a message. Moves can be undo multiple times to the start of the game. The undo button is located at the lower right corner.
